H0.text: Which football team play their home games at the Liberty Stadium. Cardiff City FC

H1.text: Which football team play their home games at the Liberty Stadium. Newport County FC

H2.text: Which football team play their home games at the Liberty Stadium. Wrexham AFC

H3.text: Which football team play their home games at the Liberty Stadium. SCAFC

A4.text: When it opened, the Cardiff Blues rugby union club left their Cardiff Arms Park home to share the new stadium with Cardiff City.

A5.text: It is the home stadium of EFL Championship club Swansea City.

A6.text: Swansea City took full operational control of the stadium in 2018.
